comment: Dr. White's class was amazing. Weekly exercises that aren't bad at all. The exams are straightforward, as long as you took notes on the PowerPoints you are good to go! She drops lowest quiz and exam grade. Gives extra credit at end of the semester. Smooth sailing!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Professor White made one of the "hardest" viewed lab courses for psychology students easy by providing clear grading criteria, extensive feedback, and time for questions for students to gain deeper understanding of material. She provided a huge opportunity for growth and left us feeling 100x more confident in developing full research papers
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Online class bc of the pandemic. If you attend the class and take notes you will do fine There are typically assignments due about every week (like worksheets) but if you stay organized and on top of everything you'll do fine. Utilize TA's and email Dr. White with any questions - she's helpful. Know your statistical analyses. lots of writing papers
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Participation matters

comment: Dr. White's Cross- Cultural Psychology class was difficult at times, but rewarding. With a final grade that highly depends on the tests, and tests that span multiple chapters, it was very difficult to secure a good grade. With that being said, Dr. White made it as easy as possible for students to succeed, and is a great choice for a professor.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: Dr. White was one of my favorite professors until this past semester. I received the final grade of an C when I should have made an easy A. Made all A's on my work besides the exams which were very difficult. Even though I made A's on literally every thing else all because of the exams I got a C. Unbalanced grading scale. Exams worth sixty percent.
rating_tags: Respected--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: This class was switched to online, which made it very difficult to learn the material. The book was the main source of information and the tests were based on the book, but the tests are very hard, because they ask very specific questions from the book. Dr. White is very liberal and you can see that in her content.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: I love Dr. White as a person. Shes a very passionate prof which is rare these days. However, I should have made a easy A yet received a B due to her unbalanced grading scale. She made exams worth more than half your final grade which makes it difficult to succeed overhaul in the course. Frustrating when you pay so much for courses.
rating_tags: Respected--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: Dr. White is great! Psych Lab was a new class this semester so in a way she was going in blind and so were we but it turned out really great! In class she was always willing to give amazing feedback that would actually help your understanding. Even with this pandemic Dr. White was outstanding!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Caring

comment: This course is super easy because it's fascinating. Dr. White provided flexibility in grading and made the class super easy to pass as long as you try.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Very organized and clear in instruction. She clearly cares about her students, which is hard to find with online professors. Dr. White is amazing!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Dr. White is freaking great. She is charismatic, smart & caring; hands down one of the best professors I've had. Her class is composed of 5 papers, 2 group assignments, 3 test & a final, and 10 quizzes. She gives extra credit & drops lowest exam and quiz grades. There is a lot of reading but it pays off. Overall, I would deff take her again!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Loved this class. It was my easy A. All quizzes and exams were open right away so I took the time to get done way ahead of time and focus on my harder classes. One paper and she grades super fairly and gives amazing feedback for the final draft. She seems to really care.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Dr. White is funny, caring, helpful, & smart! 10/10 would recommend! She doesn't manually take attendance however, you will miss out on a lot of info if you don't show up. 3 exams & she drops your lowest exam grade. A lot of very tedious research work that can be frustrating. Online quiz & reading textbook before every class. Loved the class setup
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Shes very smart and her lectures are very well planned. Come to class, take notes, do the work she provides and youll easily get an A.
rating_tags: Respected--Amazing lectures--Caring

comment: Amazing instructor who really cares about your retaining the material. The class isnt hard, but you have to be a good student. You dont get to slack off.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Difficult class, but the material is difficult as well. Dr. White has an odd set up for class, as you learn at home and apply in class, but she is open to help. Lots of reading and work, but Dr. White will be as helpful as possible without spoon feeding it to you. Difficult class, but understandably so.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: No no no! Do not! The material is easy but the fully applied test is deceiving and uncaused for. Some of the answers seem like its two right answers. The class agrees. 24 quizzes, 5 dropped, discussion questions, three exam and class project that include research and articles for every question (busy work). Its just too much trust me.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read

comment: Prof White is very passionate about the subject but her lectures are extremely dry and hard to follow. First half of the semester is all about tests and you have to read a chapter before every class cause there is an online quiz before each class. Tests are hard but most of its from the book.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: This is not a class where you can slack off, but if you do everything that you're expected to do, it's not a hard class by any means. The lit review paper is crucial; don't procrastinate, and do put effort into each step of the process because it'll make the final thing a lot easier. You will get GREAT feedback on all of your work and learn lots.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Hilarious--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Easily one of the best teachers I have ever had. Dr. White makes her passion for learning your passion. If you want to be excited about a subject, she's the teacher to get. She is a tough grader though and really wants people to think about things. While this is difficult, its worth the work just to have a class with her.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: Going to class is next to pointless. There are quizzes online almost everyday, covering about 30 pages from the book and contain annoyingly specific details and convoluted vocabulary, 10 min time limit, 10 questions. The tests are based on the book. There's a group and cultural project. Dr. White is sweet, but her class is a tedious nightmare.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: LOVED this course! Yes there is a chunk of reading before each class but it is a flipped classroom. Because of this, I learned so much. The discussions and debates during class were wonderful. She is open minded and easy to talk to. Tests are easy if you use her study guides and take notes during reading. I plan to take her again.
rating_tags: Respected--Get ready to read--Amazing lectures

comment: This professor assigns so much to quiz on it's like having an exam on a book on every detail. She loves it but doesn't seem to keep in mind that people have other responsibilities to do  outside of his class. The worst class this semester.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--TEST HEAVY--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: You know when you're learning social issues in class and it's awkward at times? That's not the case with Dr. White. She is able to keep the class on topic and keeps the conversations respectable. She was intuitive and a realist. She is open minded and utilizes the text book to help students get a better perspective on social issues.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Get ready to read--Amazing lectures

comment: Does not care about student inconvenience. Quizzes everyday after tons of reading.
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--TEST HEAVY--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Get ready to read, read, and read some more. And even after you've finished reading she'll have you read again. So much busy work you won't have time for any other class. She's nice professor, and is knowledgeable about her subject. But she's difficult without a cause. Her exams are dreadful. My worst class this semester. I wouldn't take her again.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: I hate this class. The exams are the worst. I wouldn't take her again. Exams are online and you have to answer each question to move on. You are not allowed to skip to the next and come back to it. If you want exams that will incorporate math, sci, his, soci, econ while expecting you to choose the right psych answer, then you have the right class.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: RUN LIKE THE PLAUGE!!! Quiz on reading EVERY CLASS! 6 online exams! 25 questions to complete in 30mins! Once you save the answer you are screwed because you can't go back and change it! Her reason? Students cheat. So the good has to suffer for the bad. Tough luck for slow readers like myself! Questions are EXTREMLY difficult! Class average was 70%.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--TEST HEAVY
